```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(gt)
```

Create a display table based on `sleep` (Student's Sleep Data).

```{r}
gt(data = sleep) %>%
  fmt_scientific(columns = vars(extra)) %>%
  tab_footnote(
    footnote = "This is a footnote",
    locations = cells_data(columns = 1, rows = c(2, 3, 4)))
```

```{r}
dplyr::tibble(num_1 = c(-23, -5.43, 0, NA, 35.3)) %>% gt() %>%
fmt_currency(columns = "num_1", decimals = 2, currency = "USD", placement = "left")
```
